OOC: Its been a while, I don't remember much about Nightstrike.  Could
someone who remembers take the lead?

On Sat, Apr 3, 2010 at 1:50 AM, <airly2002@...> wrote:

>
>
> Talon:
>
> "Tucson... Its beautiful... I dont know what to say"Talon smiled while she
> took the compass and she said "I've tought that you have forgotten me, but i
> was mistaken... I'm very happy to see you again"
>
>  Talon Blushed, she felt overhelmed with happpines, after her heart was
> broken twice, she never tought that she was able to feel like right in that
> instant but at the same time a part of her was feared to suffer again
>
>  *From:* Sandy <magicquartz@...>
> *Sent:* Thursday, April 01, 2010 7:54 AM
> *To:* nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> *Subject:* Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back
>
>
>
> Tucson looks to Talon and gathers all his courage at this point to finally
> speak up and start the conversation.
>
> " When I couldn't see anything, you a great help in that first battle we
> fought together.. I - don't think anyone else would have risked their life
> like you had, for me. A piece of " Old Junk" as Nightstrike put it.. After
> that, you stuck by me when you didn't have to. That meant quite a bit to me
> Talon. It still does. And now, in more ways than one.. I - meant what I
> said, you're more beautiful than I ever imagined before I could see what you
> looked like. And not only are you beautiful on the outside, you're also
> beautiful on the inside."
>
> He gently takes her hand.
>
> " I'm sure you've heard this from a lot of other bots but I mean every word
> honestly. And I'd be honored if you could continue to be beside me not only
> in battle, but companionship."
>
> He remembered an artifact, a tiny artifact that he had found on Atlantis. A
> compass, which he was able to restore simply by feel alone. The compass also
> held a tiny pearl inside, as part of its decoration. He takes it out of his
> subspaced gauntlet, and presents it to Talon.
>
> " Now I know why I held onto this for so long. Before I left Atlantis, I
> was working on restoring this artifact. It's nothing large, but, I know it's
> valuable. I'd like you to have this."
>
> The pearl sparkles as lights touch it.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com <nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com>, Kraftlos
> <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> >
> > "That will be fine. We've been so busy here thay I haven't had a chance
> to
> > do much of anything," said Perseus, returning the salute.
> >
> > Just then Depthcharge came out of the command center door, followed by
> > Kenzo.
> >
> > "Ah, so you were the maximal in the CR chamber. I am Perseus, the leader
> of
> > the Pasificus Maximals."
> >
> > "Depthcharge, Maximal Security," he replied with a formal tone. "If you
> > need to interrogate someone, I have some experience with that and may be
> > able to help." He turned to Tuscon, "May I accompany you?"
> >
> > On Mar 30, 2010 10:20 AM, "Sandy" <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> >
> > Tucson had gotten Lord Elder's message. He wasn't quite sure who
> > Nightstrike worked for, and was happy for the word up.
> >
> > "Thank you Lord Elder, I should have asked that before I left, my bad.
> > Tucson Prime out. Sorry Lord Perseus, it was Lord Elder. I'm glad he
> > contacted me because I didn't know that Nightstrike wasn't one of Hydras'
> > men. But, I still need to question him of course. It's great to actually
> > see you this time, sir."
> >
> > He salutes Lord Perseus, and then looks over to Talon who smiles back to
> > him. He had not forgotten her. He had strong feelings for her and was
> > happy to see her for the first time.
> >
> > " You're even more beautiful than I imagined before I could see you. When
> > I'm finished, I'd really like to - well.. You know um, get to know you a
> > little better.. Er... I'm not good at this.. Anyway, I have to go."
> >
> > He visibly turns a slight shade of red around his optics. He then gathers
> > himself to prepare to question Nightstrike as to Unicron's intentions. He
> > knew he had several things happening at once, and to be a Prime to him,
> > meant he had to be well rounded. He also felt that Unicron's objectives
> had
> > something to do with the opression that was hovering over the planet. As
> > always, he was curious as to why things were happening.
> >
> > " If it's all right with both of you, I'd like to ask Nightstrike some
> > questions. When in doubt, seek the answers from unlikely resources...
> > Something I kind of learned on my own."
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com <nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com>, Kraftlos
> <kraftlos@> wrote:
> > >
> >
> > > The rest of the base appeared to be secure and Lord Perseus lead the
> team
> > > back toward the comman...
> >
> > > On Mar 29, 2010 3:31 PM, <airly2002@> wrote:
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > Talon:
> > >
> > > Talon looked from the dista...
> > > *From:* Sandy <magicquartz@>
> > > *Sent:* Monday, March 29, 2010 9:38 AM
> >
> > >
> > >
> > > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com <nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com>
